Scripts.OnLoad:
TMW.SUG:EnableEditBox(self, "texture_withVarTex", true) self.BackgroundText:SetWidth(self:GetWidth()) self.label = TMW.L["ICONMENU_CUSTOMTEX"]
TMW.IE:CreateSettingFrameFromData(self, { setting = "CustomTex", title = TMW.L["ICONMENU_CUSTOMTEX"], tooltip = TMW.L["ICONMENU_CUSTOMTEX_DESC"], OnTextChanged = function(self) self:GetParent():AdjustHeight() end, ModifySettingValue = function(self, value) return value:gsub([[\\]], [[\]]) end, })
function self:DragReceived(icon, t, data, subType) local ics = icon:GetSettings()
local _, input if t == "spell" then _, input = GetSpellBookItemInfo(data, subType) elseif t == "item" then input = GetItemIcon(data) end if not input then return end
ics.CustomTex = TMW:CleanString(input) return true -- signal success end
TMW.Classes.ChatEdit_InsertLink_Hook:New(self, function(self, text, linkType, linkID) -- if the custom texture box is active, -- attempt to extract either a spellID or a texture path from the data to use. local tex if linkType == "spell" or linkType == "enchant" then -- spells and enchants can just use their spellID tex = linkID elseif linkType == "item" then -- items must get the texture path tex = GetItemIcon(linkID) elseif linkType == "achievement" then -- achievements also must get their texture path tex = select(10, GetAchievementInfo(linkID)) end if tex then -- clean off the first part of the path, it does not need to be saved -- it will be appended when the texture is used. tex = gsub(tex, "INTERFACE\\ICONS\\", "") tex = gsub(tex, "Interface\\Icons\\", "")
-- set the text self.editbox:SetText(tex)
-- notify success return true end end)

self.Header:SetText(TMW.L["ICONMENU_CUSTOMTEX"])
function self:AdjustHeight() -- self:SetHeight(11 + self.CustomTex:GetHeight()) TMW:AnimateHeightChange(self, 11 + self.CustomTex:GetHeight(), 0.1) end
